ThingDef.label: 【Second-rate】Worry Free Pill
ThingDef.description: 【Second-rate】Pill，Forget the dead, but there is a chance to forget the others.

ThingDef.label: 【Second-rate】Jade Qi Pill
ThingDef.description: Qi:300\n.【Second-rate】Pill，The potion made with a small amount of 【Nature】Save Energy Grass Seed and a large amount of Spiritual crystal has a moderate effect, but it can save a significant amount of 【Nature】Save Energy Grass Seed.\nThe progress of cultivation that can be enhanced is moderate.

ThingDef.label: 【Second-rate】Thunder Qi Pill
ThingDef.description: Qi:500\n.【Second-rate】Pill，The Pill refined with a large amount of 【Nature】Save Energy Grass Seed, due to its heavy use of 【Second-rate】Thunder Qi Pill, results in a purer Qi and can offer a more substantial progress in cultivation..\nThe progress of cultivation that can be enhanced is moderate.
